name: Elite vs. Freedom
description: Elite vs. Freedom is an action-packed Indie third-person shooter game. In the near future, the Earth is controlled by a global government. Few dare to resist this neo-feudalistic, corporatist, police state. Leading the insurgence, a group known as Freedom takes up the fight.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit only) with DirectX 9.0c, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz or better - Single Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: A graphics card with Shader Model 3.0 support, such as nVidia GeForce 7800 or ATI x1300+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: If you launch Elite vs. Freedom for the first time, UnSetup.exe needs to be run with administrator privileges. It's recommended to install the latest drivers and updates.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Processor or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 8000 series or higher, ATI Radeon HD 2400 Pro 256 MB, or greater DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: If you launch Elite vs. Freedom for the first time, UnSetup.exe needs to be run with administrator privileges. It's recommended to install the latest drivers and updates.
